name: Bovineverse BVT
description: BovineVerse is a new Fi+ metaverse platform under Web 3.0. Among the multiple parallel worlds in BovineVerse, we will successively release 3 creative and interesting games on chain and apply DAO governance to virtual social networks, crossing games and offering high flexibility. Players can own their bovine characters to socialize, adventure and create, building a diverse and colorful world together. What's more, they are encouraged to establish their guilds here. Play to Earn.
